websites.description: Full-stack realtime chat app using MERN, Socket.io, JWT auth, online status, Cloudinary uploads, Zustand global state, and TailwindCSS/Daisy UI with error handling for a smooth user experience.
Real Estate MERN app where users can discover, search, and list properties for rent or sale. Users create and manage listings, view detailed info, and log in with a clean user interface.

Online store app featuring a full shopping cart, product reviews, search functionality, user profiles with orders, admin controls, checkout process with shipping and payment options including PayPal integration.
Practice MERN app where users can sign up and add places with descriptions and addresses. Focused on MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js skills development for junior fullstack development.

Online food store with appealing design to browse meals with price and description, add meals to cart, manage item amounts, sign up/login, place orders, and receive feedback for a complete user experience.
Online clothes store showcasing items with prices and descriptions, allowing users to add products to cart, adjust quantities, and sign up/login for a smooth shopping experience.
Task manager app to add tasks with deadlines, view daily tasks, edit, delete, mark as completed with line-through, and clear completed tasks using Redux toolkit for state management.
iTunes music search clone allowing users to search songs, view artist images and names, click for detailed info including price and duration, all built with React.js.
Cocktails app where users can browse the full collection, search specific drinks, and view detailed info on each cocktail. Designed responsively with mobile adaptation.
websites.siteName: Tales of Cocktails with Redux Toolkit

websites.description: Simple app that tells jokes with button click, featuring subtitles and JavaScript text-to-speech engine integration, optimized for mobile devices.
Static travel agency website featuring tours, customer stories, and contact info, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fully responsive with smooth animations for engaging user experience.
